sections.heading: OF CESSATION OF MEMBERSHIP ANDRIGHTS OF THE FORMER PARTNERArt
sections.text: 2823. Rights of a partner after withdrawal.The former partner, his successors, or the seizing creditor is entitled to an amount equal to the value that the share of the former partner had at the time membership ceased.Acts 1980, No. 150,

sections.heading: Rights of a partner after withdrawal.
sections.text: Rights of a partner after withdrawal.
